RUNUTIL.text:
//P390PZ JOB (40700),'P390',CLASS=A,MSGCLASS=A,MSGLEVEL=(1,1),
//        NOTIFY=P390
//*
//* RUN THE MATRIX BATCH UTILITY PROGRAM
//*
//* THIS READS COMMANDS FROM SYSIN AND EXECUTES THEM
//* ASTERISK (*) IN COL 1 IS A COMMENT
//*
//* EACH LINE IS AN EXAMPLE OF A COMMAND WHICH CAN BE
//* EXECUTED AGAINST MATRIX
//*
//*
//        EXEC PGM=SSUTIL,PARM='MXPRS001'
//STEPLIB DD DSN=DIST.MATRIX.UTILITY.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSIN    DD *
* SET SERVER MTRX
  CONNECT TO SERVER MTRX
  CREATE VWA VWA2 NOMIRROR SIZE 80 K
  ASSOCIATE VWA2 WITH DSNAME(DEV.SPACE.AAAA)
  DISASSOCIATE VWA2
  DELETE VWA VWA2
* COPY VWA1 ADDR 0 LEN 500000 TO VWA2 ADDR 0
*
* CREATE VWA IX01 NOMIRROR SIZE 80 K
* CREATE VWA DAT1 NOMIRROR SIZE 100 M
* LOAD VWA DAT1 FROM DSNAME(P390.MATRIX.BIN)
* CREATE TABLE TBX1(100,15,05) INDEX IX01 DATA DAT1 CELLSIZE 0
* ALLOC CELL TABLE TBX1(0,0,1) CELLSIZE 120
* ALLOC CELL TABLE TBX1(0,0,2) CELLSIZE 150
* ALLOC CELL TABLE TBX1(0,0,3) CELLSIZE 200
* ALLOC CELL TABLE TBX1(0,0,4) CELLSIZE 123
* SAVE VWA IX01 TO DSNAME(P390.TBX1.IX01)
* ALLOC CELL TABLE TBX1(0,0,0) CELLSIZE 100
* ALLOC CELL TABLE TBX1(0,1,0) CELLSIZE 255
* SAVE TABLE TBX1 TO (P390)
* DISPLAY TABLE TBX1 CELL(0,0,1)
* DISPLAY TABLE TBX1 CELL(0,0,2)
* DISPLAY TABLE TBX1 CELL(0,0,3)
* DISPLAY TABLE TBX1 CELL(0,0,4)
* DELETE TABLE TBX1
* LOAD TABLE TBX1 FROM (P390)
* LOAD VWA DAT1 FROM DSNAME(TEST.DATA1)
* LOAD TABLE TBL1 FROM (P390)
* LOAD TABLE TBL2 FROM (P390)
* POST AAAAAAAA
* WAIT BBBBBBBB
* DISPLAY VWA DAT1 ADDR 00000000 LEN 00000100
* SWAP AAAA WITH BBBB
* DISPLAY VWA IX02 ADDR 00000000 LEN 00000100
* DISPLAY VWA DAT2 ADDR 00000000 LEN 00000100
* DELETE TABLE TBX1
* DELETE VWA BBBB
* DELETE TABLE TBX1
* DELETE VWA BBBB
* CREATE VWA BBBB SIZE 32 M
* CREATE VWA AAAA SIZE 32 M
* CREATE VWA BBBB SIZE 32 M
*
* DISASSOCIATE BBBB
* ASSOCIATE AAAA WITH DSNAME(DEV.SPACE.AAAA)
* DISPLAY BBBB ADDR 20000000 LEN 00005000
* SAVE VWA DAT1 TO DSNAME(P390.TBX1.IX01)
*
*
* DELETE VWA AAAA
* RESET AAAAAAAA
/*
